refinebio_title: Zebrafish regenerating heart after 1 day post-amputation - replicate 1 (1DPA1)
data_processing: Data were processed using the affy and gcrma packages of Bioconductor (Gentleman et al. 2004) in R. Briefly, data were imported in R, and normalized using the gcrma normalization. As data were obtained in 3 batches, a batch correction procedure (Johnson, W. E., C. Li, et al. 2007) was applied in order to homogenize the data.
description: Heart samples from heart-amputated zebrafish 1 day post amputation.
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was extracted using TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen) after disrupting the tissue with RNAse-free pistons (BioBlock) and further homogenization by passing the suspension through a 25G needle and a 1ml syringe. An additional clean-up protocol including DNAse I digestion was performed using RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen).
hyb_protocol: 1 to 2 g of total RNA was used for biotin-cRNA labeling, fragmentation and hybridization onto the Affymetrix GeneChip Zebrafish Genome Array (Affymetrix).
label_protocol_ch1: ['The GeneChip microarray processing was performed by the Functional Genomica Core in the Institute for Research in Biomedicine (Barcelona, Spain) according to the manufacturers protocols (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA) as descrived previously (Virtaneva et al., 2001).', '1 to 2 g of total RNA was used for biotin-cRNA labeling, fragmentation and hybridization onto the Affymetrix GeneChip Zebrafish Genome Array (Affymetrix).']
scan_protocol: Default settings for the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner (7G upgrade)
source_name_ch1: Zebrafish regenerating heart after 1 day post-amputation
title: Zebrafish regenerating heart after 1 day post-amputation - replicate 1 (1DPA1)
treatment_protocol_ch1: ['Wild-type AB line zebrafish were maintained at 28.5C by standard methods (Raya et al. 2003) in the animal facilities of the Salk Institute for Biological Studies (La Jolla, San Diego, USA) and the Biomedical Research Park in Barcelona (Spain).', 'Sham-operated and regenerating hearts at 1, 3, 5 and 7 days post-amputation (dpa) were harvested by pulling from the outflow tract and the sinus venosus and put into PBS. Once in PBS, the outflow tract and the atrium were removed and the ventricles were washed from blood by letting it flow into the buffer and gently pressing the tissue.']

refinebio_title: Unamputated wildtype adult zebrafish, sample 3
data_processing: The data were analyzed using the RMA algorithm. Then, LIMMA was applied to calculate significant differential expression between samples.
description: ['WT3_0', 'Gene expression data from unamputated wildtype adult zebrafish hearts.']
extract_protocol_ch1: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
hyb_protocol: Samples were hybridized to GeneChip Zebrafish Genome Arrays (Affymetrix) using a GeneChip Hybridization Oven 640.
label_protocol_ch1: 200 ng of total RNA were amplified and labeled using the WT Sense Target labeling system and control reagents (Affymetrix).
scan_protocol: GeneChip was scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 7G.
source_name_ch1: unamputated wildtype adult zebrafish
title: Unamputated wildtype adult zebrafish, sample 3

title: Zebrafish regenerating heart after 1 day post-amputation - replicate 3 (1DPA3)
treatment_protocol_ch1: ['Wild-type AB line zebrafish were maintained at 28.5C by standard methods (Raya et al. 2003) in the animal facilities of the Salk Institute for Biological Studies (La Jolla, San Diego, USA) and the Biomedical Research Park in Barcelona (Spain).', 'Sham-operated and regenerating hearts at 1, 3, 5 and 7 days post-amputation (dpa) were harvested by pulling from the outflow tract and the sinus venosus and put into PBS. Once in PBS, the outflow tract and the atrium were removed and the ventricles were washed from blood by letting it flow into the buffer and gently pressing the tissue.']

refinebio_title: Zebrafish regenerating heart after 1 day post-amputation - replicate 2 (1DPA2)
data_processing: Data were processed using the affy and gcrma packages of Bioconductor (Gentleman et al. 2004) in R. Briefly, data were imported in R, and normalized using the gcrma normalization. As data were obtained in 3 batches, a batch correction procedure (Johnson, W. E., C. Li, et al. 2007) was applied in order to homogenize the data.
description: Heart samples from heart-amputated zebrafish 1 day post amputation.
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was extracted using TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen) after disrupting the tissue with RNAse-free pistons (BioBlock) and further homogenization by passing the suspension through a 25G needle and a 1ml syringe. An additional clean-up protocol including DNAse I digestion was performed using RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen).
hyb_protocol: 1 to 2 g of total RNA was used for biotin-cRNA labeling, fragmentation and hybridization onto the Affymetrix GeneChip Zebrafish Genome Array (Affymetrix).
label_protocol_ch1: ['The GeneChip microarray processing was performed by the Functional Genomica Core in the Institute for Research in Biomedicine (Barcelona, Spain) according to the manufacturers protocols (Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA) as descrived previously (Virtaneva et al., 2001).', '1 to 2 g of total RNA was used for biotin-cRNA labeling, fragmentation and hybridization onto the Affymetrix GeneChip Zebrafish Genome Array (Affymetrix).']
scan_protocol: Default settings for the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner (7G upgrade)

title: Zebrafish regenerating heart after 1 day post-amputation - replicate 2 (1DPA2)

Once in PBS, the outflow tract and the atrium were removed and the ventricles were washed from blood by letting it flow into the buffer and gently pressing the tissue.']

refinebio_title: 7 days post-amputation wildtype adult zebrafish, sample 1
data_processing: The data were analyzed using the RMA algorithm. Then, LIMMA was applied to calculate significant differential expression between samples.
description: ['WT1_7', 'Gene expression data from 7 day post-amputation wildtype adult zebrafish hearts.']
extract_protocol_ch1: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
hyb_protocol: Samples were hybridized to GeneChip Zebrafish Genome Arrays (Affymetrix) using a GeneChip Hybridization Oven 640.
label_protocol_ch1: 200 ng of total RNA were amplified and labeled using the WT Sense Target labeling system and control reagents (Affymetrix).
scan_protocol: GeneChip was scanned using Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 7G.
source_name_ch1: 7 days post-amputation wildtype adult zebrafish
title: 7 days post-amputation wildtype adult zebrafish, sample 1
